thread.title: BRIEF-Wuhan P&S Information Tech to acquire electronic technology firm for 360 mln yuan
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Wuhan P&S Information Tech to acquire electronic technology firm for 360 mln yuan | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Wuhan P&S Information Tech to acquire electronic technology firm for 360 mln yuan
text:
Sept 14 Wuhan P&S Information Technology Co Ltd
* Says plans to acquire electronic technology firm for 360 million yuan ($56.55 million) via cash, share issue
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1M69jWC
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3664 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
